npc_output: I'm feeling sad today, I was really looking forward to dancing in the parade, but it's cloudy and I don't know if it will happen, maybe you can help me with a prank to cheer me up, like |r1|?
I'm excited to go sailing, but the fog is making it difficult to navigate, can you help me with |r2| or |r3|?
It's not going well, the storm is going to ruin my crops, I need to |r1|, but I'm not sure if I can do it in this weather.
I have many, but I think my favorite is the one I use for |r3|, want to hear it?
It's going to be hot today, perfect weather for |r1|, are you interested in joining me?
Actually, I need to |r1|, can you assist me with that?
It's hard work, but I love it, especially when I get to |r1|.
I love crafting and alchemy, but I don't have any specific requests right now.
I need to |r1|, can you help me with that, it's very important.
I think the medicinal herb is the most useful, I've been trying to |r1|, but it's not easy.
